text: **Split/ consolidation of Equity Shares in the last one year**
Our Company has not undertaken split or consolidation of its Equity Shares in the one year preceding the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.
**Exemption from complying with any provisions of securities laws, if any, granted by SEBI**
Our Company has not applied for any exemption from the SEBI from complying with any provisions of securities laws, as on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.
